      • spreadSpace

        private void spreadSpace(int row,
                         int col)
        Spread space.
        Parameters:
        row - = row of cell
        col - = column of cell This method is called when a button/cell is clicked that has a minecount of 0 it will make the 8 cells around it show their values.

      • validCoordinates

        private boolean validCoordinates(int row,
                                 int col)
        Valid coordinates.
        Parameters:
        row - the row
        col - this tells the program if it is a valid coordinate. if the input is not a button, then it will return false and send and error code.
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • neighbors

        public final void neighbors(int row,
                            int col)
        Neighbors.
        Parameters:
        row - the row
        col - this method calculates the value of each cell. it will display the number of mines that are next to it.

      • reset

        public final void reset()
        this is called from the Panel class and will reset the game so that the user can keep playing.
